titleStmt.title: An elegie in memorie, and at the interring of the body of the most famous and truely noble knight, Sir Henrie Mervyn. Paterne of all true valour; worth, and arts, who departed this life the 30. of May, and lyes interred at Westminster, anno Do: 1646.
titleStmt.author: Mercer, William, 1605?-1676?

notesStmt.note: Verse: "With wondring raptures, darting at the ayre ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
